name: Nivoxis
description: An ethereal white fox that soars through blizzards with supernatural grace. Its crystalline wings create beautiful ice patterns as it flies through the sky.

ability.name: Frost Wings
ability.description: Flying moves have 25% chance to freeze. Speed increases by 50% in hail weather. Immune to ground attacks.

moves.name: Frost Wing
moves.description: Strikes with icy wings that may freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: Summons a fierce blizzard that may freeze all enemies.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: An extremely fast attack that never misses.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.description: Creates favorable winds, doubling team's speed for 4 turns.

habitat: High mountain peaks shrouded in eternal snow
